page.title: 12The Wimpey Estate,Thorpe
page.content: {Thorpe}village is{NW}of{Rotherham, {5 miles}from town centre.The Wimpey Estate is quite large built{5 years ago.The roads are named after birds_ {Kestrel Avenue.}The land is mainly {cultivated}fields.There is part of the estate that is not completed yet.The roads branch off from{Kestrel Avenue which is shaped in a horseshoe.There are afew{cul_de_sacs.}The houses are {modern}built in brick with garages, set along the roads.The gardens are neat and quite small.The roads lead in a circle back to{Wentworth Road.}The houses look well_looked after.A lot of the people have lived on the estate for{5 years}and over.There are a lot of children.The peoples attitudes to the estate seemed pleased with the layout and especially the view which looks over fields,trees and horses grazing.The people like the estate.
